attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned wish action to be taken against the peers who walked out of the house of Lords as the names of dead soldiers were read out.

An apology is NOT enough, we feel that these people are meant to be representing the people of this country, and we feel that leaving during the reading out of names of people that died in service to Queen and Country not only makes a mockery of those fallen but the rest of the country.

We want an apology from EACH of the peers that left during the reading of the names, and would suggest they have their title stripped from them.
